usb: musb: dsps: Fix the probe error path

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.155 by commit 9ab5d539bc975b8dcde86eca1b58d836b657732e, it was introduced in version v5.4.148 by commit 9a4a6805294fa7d2653e82972bdaf9e3e1f3d3c9. For more details please see the references link.
summary: usb: musb: dsps: Fix the probe error path
